title: Tune track title marquee scrolling speed further

requirements.text: Tune the right-to-left track title marquee scrolling speed to be slightly slower than the current behavior by reducing the default `speedPxPerSecond` used by `TrackTitleMarquee` (currently `200`) so the scrolling feels less rushed across the app wherever the marquee appears.
acceptanceCriteria: The default `speedPxPerSecond` value in `frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitleMarquee.tsx` is reduced from the current value (200) to a slower value.

In both the Mini Player (`frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlayer.tsx`) and Now Playing screen (`frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.tsx`), the visible marquee scrolls right-to-left at the new slower speed without requiring any prop changes where `TrackTitleMarquee` is used.

The computed marquee animation duration increases accordingly (duration is derived from distance / speed), and remains clamped within the existing 3â€“30 seconds bounds in `frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurements.ts`.
Reduced-motion behavior and pause-on-interaction behavior continue to work as before (no regression).

constraints: Do not modify any files listed under `frontend.immutablePaths` in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No changes to marquee direction (must remain right-to-left).
No redesign of the Mini Player or Now Playing layouts beyond the speed tuning.
